column6: The Fantastic Four is helpless against the cosmic power of Epoch. The Black Panther goes one-on-one vs. The Silver Surfer. And oh, yeah, there's a new Protector of the Universe and he's got a bone to pick with Galactus.
column8: | inker:Rick Magyar | writer:Dwayne McDuffie | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller:Paul Pelletier | penciller (cover):Michael Turner | letterer:Rus Wooton
